schema.title: Main configuration object parameter
schema.description: The configuration for a gtfs_stats run

$$description: First and last date of the gtfs files to be download from bucket.
only relevant if ``use_data_from_today`` is set to false. {Format: *YYYY-MM-DD*}

use_data_from_today.description: Download only gtfs data from today (overrides date_range).

$$description: Limit the maximum size of the downloaded gtfs files (in MB).
If not set, the limit is only free disk space.

display_download_progress_bar.description: If true, displays a proggress bar while downloading.

display_size_on_progress_bar.description: If true, displays file size on the download status bar.

delete_downloaded_gtfs_zip_files.description: If true, delete the gtfs files after parsing them.

write_filtered_feed.description: If true, writes a filtered version of the gtfs for the specific dates.

console_verbosity.description: Lowest logging level to be printed to console.

$comment: The definitions are separated to a different key so it won't appear in the main doc

files.title: Files object parameters
files.description: files info would be under the `files` tag.

base_directory.description: base directory for the for the created files.

output_file_name_regexp.description: A regular expression used to find existing output files.

output_file_type.description: The file type for the outputs (for example, csv.gz).

gtfs_feeds.description: The name of the directory for the gtfs_feeds.

output.description: The name of the directory for the output files.

filtered_feeds.description: The name of the directory for the filtered feeds, if exists.

logs.description: The name of the directory for the log files.

s3.title: S3 object parameters
s3.description: All the info about the s3 connection parameters would come here (under `s3` tag).

access_key_id.description: Authorization access key id for S3.

secret_access_key.description: Authorization secert access key for S3.

upload_results.description: If true, upload the analzed results back to the S3.
